name: Thinkflow Software
overview:
A BPM and DMS Software Product company

Thinkflow is a software company that is passionate about helping people and companies do more with technology. We are leaders in process management and our understanding of process automation, transformation and improvement comes with over 2 decades of experience advising Fortune 100 companies on process related challenges.

Our BPM and DMS suites are among one of the most widely adopted tools by the business communities. Our enterprise apps platform is used by companies across different verticals for developing and deploying business solutions faster. With technology as enabler, our world-class consulting team is helping some of the biggest names industry solve process challenges.

We believe right set of systems, processes and people will make a positive impact on the business. Our systems and team of experts have always believed in empowering and putting the business in control. Our systems and unique approach towards solving a business problem have improved collaboration, delivered productivity and efficiency gains while providing greater visibility and control to the over the business.
